title: SCHOOL
subtitle: AI Training
description: Our school doesn't teach how to use tools. It teaches how to think with them. Each course is a journey of discovery, where you develop your own creative language with AI.

hero.subtitle: Cinematic Direction for One Person Studios.
hero.impact1: It's not AI cinema. It's how to operate a

entry.title: Interested in joining the School?
entry.subtitle: Stay informed about upcoming cohorts and labs.

fundamentos.title: FUNDAMENTALS
fundamentos.subtitle: Vorkurs
fundamentos.description: The necessary foundation for any journey with AI. Concepts, mindset, and first practices.

laboratorios.title: LABORATORIES
laboratorios.subtitle: Specialization
laboratorios.description: Practical immersions in specific areas. Choose your track.

capabilities.title: CREATE
capabilities.description: Produce studio-quality content. Video, image, text, code — solo.

capabilities.title: STRUCTURE
capabilities.description: Transform knowledge into product. Courses, mentoring, services, digital assets.

capabilities.title: SELL
capabilities.description: Monetize without being salesy. Narrative that converts. Presence that attracts.

capabilities.title: OPERATE
capabilities.description: Run the business in 4h/day. Systems that work while you create.

coursesGallery.title: Courses
coursesGallery.subtitle: Each course is a journey. Each journey, a transformation.
coursesGallery.bottomNote: // each course is a door. each door, a world.

modal.dedicatedPageNote: This course has a dedicated page with all information

zero-one.title: ZERO→ONE
zero-one.subtitle: Matter and Form
zero-one.description: The base course. Art thinking, fundamental storytelling, conscious creation.
zero-one.longDescription: The foundation for anyone who wants to create. From void to form, from thought to matter. This course is the starting point — where you learn the universal language of creation before choosing your instrument. Philosophy, aesthetics, narrative and creative consciousness.

artists-journey.title: ARTIST'S JOURNEY
artists-journey.subtitle: Creativity as Path
artists-journey.description: Unlock your creativity. From fear to expression.
artists-journey.longDescription: Before creating, you need to free yourself. This course is an inner journey — from creative block to authentic expression. Process, ritual, practice. Transform fear into fuel.

solo-biz.title: SOLO.BIZ
solo-biz.subtitle: One-Person Business
solo-biz.description: Structure your solo business. Offer, pricing, delivery, system.
solo-biz.longDescription: The complete business that runs with you. Learn to structure offers, set pricing, deliver value and create systems that work while you rest. It's not about scaling — it's about profiting with ease.

produto-zero.title: PRODUCT ZERO
produto-zero.subtitle: From Knowledge to Product
produto-zero.description: Transform what you know into something sellable.
produto-zero.longDescription: You already know something valuable. Now you need to package it. Learn to transform tacit knowledge into courses, mentoring, consulting or digital products. From concept to selling MVP.

narrativa-venda.title: SALES NARRATIVE
narrativa-venda.subtitle: Sell Without Performing
narrativa-venda.description: Storyselling. Authorial copy. Conversion through connection.
narrativa-venda.longDescription: Selling doesn't have to be awkward. Learn storyselling — the art of selling through stories. Copy that sounds like you. Conversion that comes from connection, not pressure.

studio-os.title: STUDIO OS
studio-os.subtitle: Creative Operating System
studio-os.description: Your AI stack for complete production.
studio-os.longDescription: Build the system that makes you produce like an entire studio. Right tools, optimized flows, smart automations. Your creation operating system with AI.

presenca-monetizada.title: MONETIZED PRESENCE
presenca-monetizada.subtitle: Audience → Revenue
presenca-monetizada.description: From followers to clients. Natural funnel.
presenca-monetizada.longDescription: Audience without revenue is a hobby. Learn to convert presence into money naturally. Funnel that works, without dirty tactics. Relationship that sells.

storycraft.title: STORYCRAFT
storycraft.subtitle: Narrative as Weapon
storycraft.description: Master the art of storytelling. Structure, arc, tension, catharsis.
storycraft.longDescription: Storytelling isn't technique — it's power. Learn to build narratives that transform, that move, that stay. From classic structure to contemporary ruptures. Character arc, tension, rhythm, catharsis. Tell stories that change the listener.

doc-real.title: DOC.REAL
doc-real.subtitle: Contemporary Documentary
doc-real.longDescription: Documentary is testimony. Learn to capture reality with authorial, ethical and transformative vision. From research to editing, from interview to narrative. Document to change.

cinema-sem-cameras.title: CINEMA WITHOUT CAMERAS
cinema-sem-cameras.subtitle: 100% AI Film
cinema-sem-cameras.description: Produce complete films without equipment. Direction with AI.
cinema-sem-cameras.longDescription: The future of cinema doesn't need cameras. Learn to direct, produce and finish complete films using only artificial intelligence. Cinematography, art direction, editing — all without physical equipment. Pure vision.

retrato-arquetipico.title: ARCHETYPAL PORTRAIT
retrato-arquetipico.subtitle: Photography & Identity
retrato-arquetipico.longDescription: Portrait isn't capture — it's revelation. Learn to create images that show the essence, not just the surface. Light, composition, direction and symbolism. Photography as mirror of the soul.

motion-lab.title: MOTION LAB
motion-lab.subtitle: Animation with AI
motion-lab.description: From static to movement. Animation and motion graphics.
motion-lab.longDescription: Movement is life. Learn to animate using artificial intelligence — from static to dynamic, from frame to flow. Motion graphics, character animation, transitions. Give life to what was still.

post-vision.title: POST.VISION
post-vision.subtitle: Editing & VFX with AI
post-vision.longDescription: The magic happens in post. Learn editing, color grading and VFX using artificial intelligence. Transform raw material into finished work. From cut to color correction, from effect to delivery.

vibe-code.title: VIBE.CODE
vibe-code.subtitle: Creative Programming
vibe-code.description: Code as artistic expression. Vibe coding, rapid prototyping.
vibe-code.longDescription: Programming isn't just logic — it's creation. Learn vibe coding: the art of building tools, experiences and prototypes using code as expressive medium. No terror, no unnecessary complexity. Code that creates code.

digital-presence.title: DIGITAL PRESENCE
digital-presence.subtitle: Sites & Presentations
digital-presence.description: Create narrative sites and presentations that look like films.
digital-presence.longDescription: Your digital presence is your territory. Learn to create sites, landing pages and presentations that don't just inform — they move. Design as narrative. Web as stage. Slides as scenes.

soundscape.title: SOUNDSCAPE
soundscape.subtitle: Music & Soundtrack with AI
soundscape.description: Creation of soundtracks, ambient music, sound design.
soundscape.longDescription: Sound is the invisible narrative. Learn to create soundtracks, ambient music and sound design using artificial intelligence. From silence to emotion, from noise to harmony. Transform atmospheres with sound.

ai-artist.title: AI ARTIST
ai-artist.subtitle: Complete Program
ai-artist.description: Intensive art program with AI. From idea to work.
ai-artist.longDescription: The complete training for the artist of the future. An intensive program that crosses all disciplines — image, sound, movement, code, narrative. From concept to finished work. Become a complete artist of the AI era.
